name: Ruffwear Front Range Harness V2
description:
Secure your dog without having to use a collar. The Front Dog Range is designed to be comfortable, durable and easy to put on.Low-profile design with 4-points of adjustment doesn’t restrict your pooch’s movement.Padded chest and belly panel keeps things comfortable.2 leashing points let you choose how you attach your pup.ID pocket keeps dog tags safe and secure.Reflective trim helps keep your best friend visible.Loop for attaching a blinky light.

        Sustainability






.bluesign-cls-1,.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{fill:none;}.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:1.79px;}.bluesign-cls-2{stroke-linejoin:round;}.bluesign-cls-3{stroke-miterlimit:10;}
